remarks: The polarity of a projective map.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
polpmap.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
polpmap.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
polpmap.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
polpmap.p $e |- P = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
polpmapN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( P ` ( M ` X ) ) = ( M ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) ) $.
